Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.zhunusov.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.zhunusov.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.tools.JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler, info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.tools.JarImpler
Implementation of Impler and JarImpler interfaces that generates class implementations for interfaces and creates JAR files containing these implementations.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException
      Generates implementation of the specified interface and writes it to the specified directory.
      Specified by:
      implement in interface info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.Impler
      Parameters:
      token - the type token of the interface to implement
      root - the root directory where the implementation file will be created
      Throws:
      info.kgeorgiy.java.advanced.implementor.ImplerException - if the specified token is not an interface or the interface is private
